title: Field Exposure Japan
description:
The module exposes students to a specific topic
related to Japan through intensive study in Japan or
another country where Japan can be studied. The
other country will have a deep engagement with
Japan in the specific area or field of study which is the
focus of the module. The module combines
orientation sessions at NUS with a 5 to 10 days
intensive field study experience. The focus of the
module will differ based on the expertise of the
faculty member teaching the module.
